rows.label: qst201814_msg0001
rows.name: Are you alright?!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0002
rows.name: You came to save us? Thank goodness...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0003
rows.name:
If you were any later, we would have
been eaten by the Vacillus Antol.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0004
rows.name: Thank you so much.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0005
rows.name:
No thanks are necessary. I'm
just glad everyone is safe.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh, right! Is there someone
named Pepe-san among you?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm Pepe... but why
do you know my name?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0008
rows.name:
Mimi-san from Iyasaki Village
asked me to find you!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0009
rows.name: Mimi did?!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0010
rows.name: Yes. Mimi-san was very worried.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0011
rows.name:
I see, Mimi... I'm sorry
I made her worry...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0012
rows.name:
Pepe-san, why were you traveling
through different countries?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0013
rows.name:
It seems you were gathering
young people from various
Phonex communities?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0014
rows.name:
Actually, I was gathering
allies to fight a monster.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0015
rows.name: Allies to fight a monster?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0016
rows.name: Yes!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0017
rows.name: You met Mimi in Iyasaki Village, right?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0018
rows.name:
She was attacked by a vicious monster
I call the Demon King, and now she's
too scared to go outside.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0019
rows.name:
So she can't even return to her
family in the settlement and has
been stuck in the village.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0020
rows.name:
I want to defeat the Demon King so
that Mimi can go outside again!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0039
rows.name:
But I can't do it alone... so I
traveled to other countries to
gather strong Phonex allies.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0021
rows.name: So that's what happened...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0022
rows.name:
But my journey is over. My
goal has been achieved!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0023
rows.name:
...So that means you've
found strong allies!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0024
rows.name:
Who are they? Please
introduce me to them!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0040
rows.name: Hm? What's wrong?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0026
rows.name:
Yes, at the end of this long
journey, I have finally found
the strongest ally...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0028
rows.name: It is you, Uka!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0029
rows.name:
Please, come back with us to the Liberalitas
Archipelago and help us defeat the Demon
King that nests on the Isle of Urchon!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0030
rows.name: Huh? Me?!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0031
rows.name: Please wait, I'm not that strong...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0032
rows.name:
No, with your swift movements
and the power of that headbutt!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0033
rows.name:
With you, Uka, we can surely
defeat the Demon King!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0034
rows.name: Hmm, but...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0035
rows.name:
Please! You are the only
hope left for me and Mimi!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0036
rows.name:
...Alright, I understand!
We've come this far, let's
see it through to the end!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0037
rows.name:
Leave it to Uka and her
Driver! We'll do our best!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0038
rows.name:
Let's defeat the Demon King on
the Isle of Urchon and bring
peace of mind to Mimi-san!
